description: This file defines a React component for a review submission form, including state management, form handling, and UI elements for rating, comments, and user name. It also interacts with external review submission logic.

classes.name: ReviewForm
classes.description: React component for rendering a form that allows users to submit reviews for a recipe.

methods.name: ReviewForm
methods.description: Main functional component that manages review form state and handles submission.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission; validates input and calls submitReview.
